Description.Text: The Grand Park Otaru is an elegant 4-star property offering comfortable accommodation overlooking the calm Ishikari Bay and Otaru Marina. The hotel sits beside the coast in the picturesque sea-trading port of Otaru, adjacent to the Wing Bay Otaru, one of Hokkaido's largest shopping malls. Otaru is a quiet city with Victorian-style buildings and beautiful canals. The hotel offers a close proximity to top-class golf courses and ski resorts, and Otaru city centre can be easily reached by car or by using the nearby JR train station. The hotel is housed in an 18-storey building overlooking Ishikari Bay. There are no leisure facilities onsite, but there is an internet corner. The hotel offers all-day dining in the Terrace Brasserie, afternoon tea in the Bay Lounge and an award-winning cocktail selection in the Marina bar. Freshly baked breads and pastries are available in Patisserie. The Superior Mountain View rooms measure 32sqm, feature elegant and polished decor and offer stunning views of the mountain ranges and the charming streets. Amenities include a flat-screen TV, high-speed wired internet, a security safe and tea and coffee making facilities. The hotel has a concierge team and offers room service.
